scripts.build:dev: npx postcss ./css/main.css --output ./assets/compiled_css/main.css --env dev && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config_dev.yml
scripts.serve:dev: npx postcss ./css/main.css --output ./assets/compiled_css/main.css --env dev && bundle exec jekyll serve --config _config_dev.yml
scripts.build:prod: npx postcss ./css/main.css --output ./assets/compiled_css/main.css --env production && bundle exec jekyll build
